author: Tal Axelrod
title: Rhode Island Gov. Raimondo issues 'stay at home' order amid coronavirus pandemic
description: Rhode Island Gov. Gina Raimondo (D) on Saturday issued an executive order mandating that residents of the state stay at home amid the coronavirus outbreak.
content:
Rhode Island Gov. Gina Raimondo (D) on Saturday issued an executive order mandating that residents of the state stay at home amid the coronavirus outbreak. 
The order, which will extend until April 13, comes after two Rhode Islanders died from the highly inf… [+1343 chars]
